```html
  • Initializes the game, network, input, UI, and sound systems.
  • Manages game state, map generation, player movement, and mining.
  • Implements settings, save/load, shop, and admin functionality.
    const $ = id => document.getElementById(id);
    Network.connect();

This HTML creates an online multiplayer game called Mega Miner. It uses MQTT for real-time communication between players. The game logic includes map generation, player movement, resource management, and a shop system.

```
